entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Temiskaming Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Blowing snow before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
